title: About skills
text: - Here you can find non-class skills added in Sanctuary of Exile
- For vanilla skills, please refer to [Vanilla PD2 Wiki](https://wiki.projectdiablo2.com/wiki/Main_Page)

title: Frailty
text: Frailty is a new aura that reduces enemy physical resistance:
- Reduces enemy physical resistance - starts at 10% and receives 1% additional reduction per level

title: Rimefall
text: Shoot forth cold enchanted arrow that leave a wave of rimefall behind, dealing cold damage to enemies:
- Converts 50% physical damage to elemental damage

title: Reinforce
text: New defensive skill that allows scaling of %PDR, flat PDR and MDR with base defence:
- scales of BASE defense from items + bonus from dexterity - this means that any % enhanced defense is not taken into account
- Gain 2 physical damage reduction per base defense according to formula
- Gain 1% physical damage reduction per base defense according to formula
- Gain 2 magic damage reduction per base defense according to formula

title: Necromancer class changes
text: - On hit it forks to nearby enemies
- Gain additional forks at base level 10 an 20
- On impact with enemy or wall, leaves a unholy ground that deals magic damage over time
- Projectile can pierce, leaving DoT ground on contact with every enemy
- Gains additional projectile at base level 20
- Will now also reduce magic resist but at half the rate of elemental resistances reduction

title: Sorceress class changes
text: - Glacial Spike no longer freezes and explodes
- Now forks to max 3 nearby enemies (starts at 1, 1 additional at levels 15 and 25)

title: Paladin class changes
text: - Now receives +1% to maximum Physical Resistance per 10 levels
- Entirely new skill that was has replaced `Holy Nova`
- Hitting the enemy creates holy ground that deals magic damage over time and regenerates your HP
- The initial hit deals splash damage
- Converts 10% + 2% per base level (max 50%) to magic damage
- The damage over time from ground effect benefits from magic mastery
- The regeneration scales with LEVELS, not BASE LEVELS (so it does not stop at hard 20 points)
- No longer requires two handed sword to function - now works with every melee weapon type
- No longer only adds % damage to undead and demons - now adds damage % to all enemies, but at half rate as before
- Adds magic damage to your melee attacks

title: Amazon class changes
text: - New skill that replaced Guided Arrow
- Shoots a projectile that creates a tornado at the end of its range or on collision, that lingers for 1 second
- Main and secondary projectiles deal 20% of weapon damage
- Receives additional projectile on base level 20
- The main projectiles do not pierce
- Can mana leech, life leech, critical/deadly strike, apply crushing blow
- New skill that replaced Charged Strike
- Hit your enemy and create multiple twisters
- Both initial hit and twisters deal 75% of weapon damage
- Both initial hit and twisters convert 50% of physical damage to cold
- Can mana leech, life leech, critical/deadly strike, apply crushing blow and proc effects
- Now receives synergy from Tornado Shot

title: Barbarian class changes
text: - Now also reduces poison length at the same rate as resistances (with diminishing returns; poison length reduced by 63% at level 20)
- Now adds 1% maximum fire, cold and lightning resistance every 10 base levels
- Strike the enemy, unearthing spikes from the ground, that move forward and deal damage to enemies
- Each spike deals damage separately equal to 50% of your weapon damage
- Initial hit deals damage equal to 50% of your weapon damage
- Create 2 spikes at first level and get additional spikes every 10 levels
- No longer requires two weapons to work
- Synergy changed from Perforate to Bash
